116 template <class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
117 class stMLogicNode{
118  public:
124  stMLogicNode(int maxOccupation);
125 
131  ~stMLogicNode();
132 
142  int AddEntry(ObjectType * obj){
143 
144  Entries[Count].Object = obj;
145  Entries[Count].Mine = true;
146  Count ++;
147  return Count - 1;
148  }//end AddEntry
149 
159  int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
160 
164  int GetNumberOfEntries(){
165  return Count;
166  }//end GetNumberOfEntries
167 
173  ObjectType * GetObject(int idx){
174  return Entries[idx].Object;
175  }//end GetObject
176 
182  ObjectType * operator [](int idx){
183  return Entries[idx].Object;
184  }//end operator []
185 
191  stPageID GetPageID(int idx){
192  return Entries[idx].PageID;
193  }//end GetPageID
194 
201  stDistance GetRadius(int idx){
202  return Entries[idx].Radius;
203  }//end GetRadius
204 
212  void SetEntry(int idx, stPageID pageID, stDistance radius){
213  Entries[idx].PageID = pageID;
214  Entries[idx].Radius = radius;
215  }//end GetPageID
216 
223  void AddIndexNode(stMIndexNode * node);
224 
231  void AddLeafNode(stMLeafNode * node);
232 
238  int GetRepresentativeIndex(int idx){
239  return RepIndex[idx];
240  }//end GetRepresentativeIndex
241 
247  ObjectType * GetRepresentative(int idx){
248  return Entries[RepIndex[idx]].Object;
249  }//end GetRepresentative
250 
258  void SetRepresentative(int rep0, int rep1){
259  RepIndex[0] = rep0;
260  RepIndex[1] = rep1;
261  }//end SetRepresentative
262 
275  int Distribute(stMIndexNode * node0, ObjectType * & rep0,
276  stMIndexNode * node1, ObjectType * & rep1,
277  EvaluatorType * metricEvaluator){
278  int result;
279 
280  // Distribute...
281  result = TestDistribution(node0, node1, metricEvaluator);
282 
283  // Representatives
284  rep0 = BuyObject(GetRepresentativeIndex(0));
285  rep1 = BuyObject(GetRepresentativeIndex(1));
286 
287  return result;
288  }//end Distribute
289 
302  int Distribute(stMLeafNode * node0, ObjectType * & rep0,
303  stMLeafNode * node1, ObjectType * & rep1,
304  EvaluatorType * metricEvaluator){
305  int result;
306 
307  // Distribute...
308  result = TestDistribution(node0, node1, metricEvaluator);
309 
310  // Representatives
311  rep0 = BuyObject(GetRepresentativeIndex(0));
312  rep1 = BuyObject(GetRepresentativeIndex(1));
313 
314  return result;
315  }//end Distribute
316 
329  int TestDistribution(stMIndexNode * node0, stMIndexNode * node1,
330  EvaluatorType * metricEvaluator);
331 
342  int TestDistribution(stMLeafNode * node0, stMLeafNode * node1,
343  EvaluatorType * metricEvaluator);
344 
349  void SetMinOccupation(int min){
350  MinOccupation = min;
351  // At least the nodes must store 2 objects.
352  if ((MinOccupation > (MaxEntries/2)) || (MinOccupation == 0)){
353  MinOccupation = 2;
354  }//end if
355  }//end SetMinOccupation
356 
361  stNodeType GetNodeType(){
362  return NodeType;
363  }//end GetNodeType
364 
368  void SetNodeType(stNodeType type){
369  NodeType = type;
370  }//end SetNodeType
371 
378  bool IsRepresentative(int idx){
379  return ((idx == RepIndex[0]) || (idx == RepIndex[1]));
380  }//end IsRepresentative
381 
393  ObjectType * BuyObject(int idx){
394  Entries[idx].Mine = false;
395  return Entries[idx].Object;
396  }//end BuyObject
397 
398  private:

427

432  };

1067  void WriteHeader(){
1068  // Test if the header was modified.
1069  if (this->HeaderUpdate){

1072  this->HeaderUpdate = false;
1073  }//end if
